an4.99:1.3: Attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno no attahitāya, nevattahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya ca.
an4.99:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya?
an4.99:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:2.3: attanā adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:2.4: attanā kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:2.5: attanā musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:2.6: attanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:2.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.99:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya?
an4.99:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā pāṇātipātā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:3.3: attanā adinnādānā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:3.4: attanā kāmesumicchācārā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:3.5: attanā musāvādā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:3.6: attanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:3.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya.
an4.99:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya?
an4.99:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā pāṇātipātā appaṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti …pe… attanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā appaṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:4.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.99:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca?
an4.99:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, parañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti …pe… attanā ca surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca.
an4.99:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
